oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Haselrig Dairy Processing Plant
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Work
African Americans -- Employment; Dairy plants
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man processing milk at the Haselrig Dairy.
The Haselrig family operated the only African American owned dairy in Chattanooga, and they delivered milk door-to-door. The dairy was closed in 1965.
